mapper.insert: insert into tvl_msg(mno2, mno, cont, sd_dt) values(#{sendMemberNo}, #{receiveMemberNo}, #{contents}, now())
mapper.select: select tvl_msg.mno, mnm, msgno, mno2, cont, sd_dt, mpho from tvl_msg inner join tvl_membs on tvl_msg.mno2 = tvl_membs.mno where msgno in ( select max(msgno) from tvl_msg inner join tvl_membs on tvl_msg.mno2 = tvl_membs.mno where tvl_msg.mno = #{receiveNo} group by mno2 ) order by msgno desc;

select tvl_msg.mno, mnm, msgno, mno2, cont, sd_dt, mpho from tvl_msg inner join tvl_membs on tvl_msg.mno2 = tvl_membs.mno where (mno2=#{sendNo} and tvl_msg.mno=#{receiveNo}) or (mno2=#{receiveNo} and tvl_msg.mno=#{sendNo}) order by msgno desc

select tvl_msg.msgno,tvl_sch.schno, tvl_membs.mnm, tvl_msg.cont, tvl_membs.mpho, tvl_tvlmain.tmno from tvl_membs inner join tvl_tvlmain on tvl_tvlmain.mno = tvl_membs.mno inner join tvl_msg on mno2 = tvl_membs.mno inner join tvl_sch on tvl_tvlmain.tmno = tvl_sch.tmno where msgno in ( select max(msgno) from tvl_msg inner join tvl_membs on tvl_msg.mno2 = tvl_membs.mno where tvl_msg.mno2 = #{profileNo} ) order by tmno desc

select tvl_membs.mnm, tvl_msg.cont, tvl_membs.mpho from tvl_membs inner join tvl_msg on mno2 = tvl_membs.mno where msgno in ( select max(msgno) from tvl_msg inner join tvl_membs on tvl_msg.mno2 = tvl_membs.mno where tvl_msg.mno2 = #{profileNo} ) order by msgno desc
